original_text: And she said, Who would have said unto Abraham, that Sarah should have given children suck? for I have born him a son in his old age.
korean_text: 또 이르되 사라가 자식들을 젖먹이겠다고 누가 아브라함에게 말하였으리요마는 아브라함의 노경에 내가 아들을 낳았도다 하니라

sentences.original_text: Who would have said unto Abraham
that Sarah should have given children suck?
for I have born him a son
